name: compensable
content:

Add to word list
If a problem, condition, or activity is compensable, people who experience it or suffer from it can or must be given compensation (= money): compensable injury He gave his opinion that the worker's symptoms were a result of the compensable injury. It was argued that the worker herself may not have considered the incident to be compensable.
